reviews.review: The Emoji Movie is one of the greatest films of all time, two years later after its theatrical premiere and its still a wonderful classic that will never be topped. The film has oscar worthy animation, acting, and writing to the point where after you watch the film once, you leave as a different person entirely. The film is so immersive that even the youngest of toddlers can tell that the creators of this film have poured there heart and soul into it and easily the magnum opus of Sony Pictures Animation. The Humor is also absolutely amazing, it feels like the writers of the jokes were written by Jimmy Kimmel himself and a group of people who use Reddit daily, I laughed at the film until my lungs were completely numb. This film is the only stance between creative freedom and the overly controlled corporate minds of Disney and Pixar, i rate this film a 10 out of 10, what an absolute masterpiece, my god.
If you are thinking about seeing this movie, know that you are making a big mistake
